revised_title: Anatomical Analysis of Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum Fossil Plants
tldr: This article examines the anatomical features of Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum fossil plants, focusing on their central cylinder, cortex, and branching patterns. The authors provide a detailed analysis of the variations in structure due to the part of the branch, age, and specific distinctions among these plants.
